name: pOng (itch) (Hzalkarim)
description:
A variant of pong

Game control : 
- Space bar : reset disk
- W-S, A-D, Arrows : Move
- Q : Change side ( They have different AI Behavior, so please do change side )
- E : Change View
- R : Invert control
- T : Change control orientation

Serve is automated
